channel.title: Making Sled Wieldable
channel.description:
I'm pretty new to making private servers, and I wanted to know if there was a way to make the Sled on my server wieldable? It only gives the 'Use' and 'Examine' options, and I wanted to know how I could get it to work?
I couldn't find and guides.
Thank you in advance :)

item.title: Making Sled Wieldable
item.dc:creator: @ForsakenProsperity ForsakenProsperity
item.description:
@ForsakenProsperity wrote:

The Animations for it aren’t working. I can wield it though. It shows as if I’m actually running but I want the riding animation.

Read full topic

item.title: Making Sled Wieldable
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

There are two sled ids. The first one is an un-waxed sled, the second is a waxed-sled, which is able to be equipped.

Read full topic
